ModName: Cubiix Project: To The Stars Assets
ModDesc: A Collection of assets tailored for Cubiix Project:TTS

V_B.01.00.Description:
Hello, thank you for opening this game and coming to look at what I've spent the last 2 years of my life working on!


So far what I've added to this game is character customizing, chat, servers, commands, multiplayer, modding, and you name it really, there's no 'actual' content yet, but that will show up soon enough as I keep working on this project!


If you'd like to help support this project, please consider following me on [color=blue][url={"OpenURL": "duskitten.bsky.social"]Bluesky[/url][/color].

Or even consider donating via [color=blue][url={"OpenURL": "https://www.patreon.com/c/CubiixProject"]Patreon[/url][/color]!


Thank you for coming to enjoy my world and one of my various joys in life!
V_B.01.00.Author: Duskitten
